meta.title: Fighting Tech Website
meta.author: Alexander Sopov
meta.keywords: Fighting, Boxing, VR, Virtual-Reality, Virtual Reality, MMA, Kick Boxing

intro.caption: Perfect your technique. Sparr without injuries. Experience real fighting.

p: You put on specialized shoes and gloves that track your body and enter a ring. No one's there. You put on the VR helmet.
Transported into the digital world you now spot your opponent in the opposite corner. A digital representation of someone who's geared up like you, perhaps on the other side of the world
The bell rings, you circle each other, waiting for the first strike.
When it lands, it registers as a hit, but no one is injured.
Because you're not actually hitting each other, because you're facing digital ghosts.
